title: Good news and bad news about Rengar everyone!
body:
The good news is currently on PBE, Rengar lost his Battle Roar (W) Ferocity CC prevention effect, so it no longer "prevents incoming ones for 1.5 seconds".

The bad news is Rito finds it okay for him to still have the initial CC break however.

https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-SMe4_oVSx4o/WIkPFT4_XyI/AAAAAAABBW0/dXq7IhjcnuwzkykiRiiGYhJz9rItqdamQCLcB/s640/batt.jpg
